column4: Hi, entering passwords after bringing up Sudo in the terminal console won't work

well i'm trying out this; https://help.ubuntu.com/8.04/switching/dualboot-custom.html and after doing a sudo (sudo cp menu.lst menu_backup.lst) etc then it requests a password for my useraccount and when i try to enter it it won't type
you wont see anything appear. that is ok. just type it nyways.
